verbose_text: Functional HLH-30 is required for autophagy induction and life-span extension in multiple longevity models and mediates appropriate transcriptional response during starvation, as well as heat stress and bacterial infection.
evidence: HLH-30 is required for autophagy induction and life-span extension in multiple longevity models               and mediates appropriate transcriptional response during starvation                           , as well as heat
